tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
She is excellent and know her job very well 
Clinic is very clean and with all latest equipments. Staff is also excellent

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have been a regular at The Dental Studio for all of my dental issues for the last couple of years. Doctor is very efficient at her work. She is constantly upgrading her facility .The support staff is also quite efficient. This time I visited her for my wisdom tooth pain that needed a minor surgery. The removal hardly took me 15 min for the professional oral surgeon to get my wisdom tooth out.
It was absolutely painless and trouble free.  They also gave post surgical advice in detail and checked on my healing from time to time.
I wholeheartedly recommend them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a really bad toothache so I called and spoke to the lovely Supriya and booked for the following day. However, during the course of the day, I was in so much pain. I called again and Supriya adjusted me in an emergency apt with Dr Gunjan who was amazing and looked after me so well and really put me at ease. I have to say that this has to be one of the best medical experiences I have had and nobody really likes going to the dentist. I will be recommending you to everyone. Thanks for looking after me

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I visited The Dental Studio for my dental implants. ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* Dr Gunjan and Dr Chitrang are absolutely amazing at their work. They made me feel very comfortable and the entire procedure went smoothly without any pain and discomfort.
The staff is very polite and helpful.
Clinic is hygienic 
Definitely recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was dated to smile due to malaligned teeth .
With The Dental Studio they gave me confidence that it can be set right and I can smile again with confidence.
My entire treatment was done with super care and minimal pain.
It took some time but was worth it and I have got a wonderful smile now.
They are true to their name .
Thank you Dr Gunjan and the entire team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Gunjan  has a light hand and very well mannered. She takes the utmost care to carry out a detailed study & does not recommend unnecessary procedures or medication. The clinic is always spotless and well organised. Never felt better going to the Dentist!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Gunjan is absolutely awesome! Had a wonderful experience with her for my dental treatment. Even though its been many years now, she is always very welcoming and prioritizes her patients' needs. Not only is she very skilled in her work, but also a wonderful person who is always a delight to meet.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Gunjan is really friendly and approachable and  shows so much love and care for her patients. They are always cheerful and make the patients feel at ease. I have been a patient here since 20 years now, I got my braces , rootcanal wisdom teeth extraction done here, and get all my regular cleanups  done here as well. I am super satisfied and happy and I would definitely recommend The Dental Studio.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It was one of the best experience of my life..Dr Gunjan performed my root canal treatment for my upper left and right teeth..a lot of attention was paid towards the precision of the procedure..detailed explanation and video demonstration was shown to explain the treatment to be carried out in my teeth

The dental studio is a patient friendly set up with very professional and well trained doctors
